pullRequest.title: [openweathermap] adapt channels dew-point and visibility in daily forecast
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix typos in example code
One Call API: add channe dew-point for daily forecast
One Call API: remove channel visibility in daily forecast as not included
in data

Signed-off-by: Holger Friedrich mail@holger-friedrich.de

nodes.bodyText: There is a small typo: Should be precip-probability.
There is a small typo: Should be precip-probability.
There is a small typo: Should be precip-probability.
There is a small typo: Should be precip-probability.
Should we may be align the label too? "Current Dew point" without the "-".

commit.message:
[openweathermap] adapt channels dew-point and visibility in daily forecast

* Fix typos in example code
* One Call API: add channe dew-point for daily forecast
* One Call API: remove channel visibility in daily forecast as not included
  in data

Signed-off-by: Holger Friedrich <mail@holger-friedrich.de>
